name: Link Burden
description:
A project made as an ode to FE 7. In no way actually affiliated with the Fire Emblem franchise. Now that this note is out of the way, onto the meat and bones.

Link Burden follows the journey of fourteen fighters as they rebel against a tyrannical monarchy.  A short game with a few maps and a variety of weapon types, along with the typical big three seen most often. Each character has their own stat growths, upgraded class as well as skills. Features a weapon rank-lite system, wherein leveling gives access to higher ranked weapons.

If you have any comments, bug reports or if you want to yell at me, comment section is open below for such. Yes, I know what balance is. No, I don't think I will implement it. In the case of bug reports, include some detail, like game version (2.3, 2.2, etc) as well as how you came across it.

Regardless, have fun.
